Title: What We Do in the Shadows

Episodes.Title: Resurrection
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Marika Sawyer
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Nadja and Laszlo's new familiar poses problems for Guillermo, and the vampires enlist the services of a local necromancer.

Episodes.Title: Ghosts
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Paul Simms
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires hold a seance to deal with a ghost infestation, which leads to a larger infestation.

Episodes.Title: Brain Scramblies
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Jake Bender
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires attend their first human Super Bowl party, while Guillermo's search for virgins uncovers a deadly threat.

Episodes.Title: The Curse
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sarah Naftalis
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: While the vampires fear they've been electronically cursed, Guillermo tries to thwart a deadly threat to his masters.

Episodes.Title: Colin's Promotion
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Shana Gohd
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Colin Robinson gets promoted at work and his new power threatens the balance of power in the vampire house.

Episodes.Title: On the Run
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Stefani Robinson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: After a vengeful enemy from the past appears without warning, Laszlo flees his home and goes into hiding to avoid certain death.

Episodes.Title: The Return
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Shana Gohd
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: The vampires offer shelter to an old nemesis who's down on his luck.

Episodes.Title: Collaboration
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sam Johnson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: Nandor's old familiar from the 1970s returns to Staten Island; Guillermo leaves to serve a new master; Nadja and Laszlo revive their musical act.

Episodes.Title: Witches
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, William Meny
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: When Nandor and Laszlo are abducted by a coven of witches, the others must venture to Brooklyn to rescue them.

Episodes.Title: Nouveau Théâtre des Vampires
Episodes.Writer: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Sam Johnson
Episodes.Actors: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou
Episodes.Plot: As they prepare to attend an exclusive event on the vampire social calendar, the vampires try to survive without Guillermo.
